review: Amazing Game! Best Zero dollars i have EVER spent. Adictive and fun. Every thought in this game, has to be thought over five times to find out if its the right move to make. Otherwise, you will learn the hard way, how to be great.
The most fun I've had ages. There is so much to explore and dicover. It's both wonderous and terrifying. Don't play if you don't like deep water. (Fear the Reaper)
